name: Implementing Real-Time Analysis with Hadoop in Azure HDInsight
tagline: Learn how to build low-latency big data solutions
body:
![Implementing Real-Time Analysis with Hadoop in HDInsight](https://webview.edx.org/sites/default/files/styles/course_video_banner/public/course/image/featured-card/dat202.2x-about_page_image-318x210.png)

***

Learn how to implement low-latency and streaming Big Data solutions using Hadoop technologies like HBase, Storm, and Spark on Microsoft Azure HDInsight. Sign up for this free course on [edX](https://www.edx.org/course/implementing-real-time-analytics-hadoop-microsoft-dat202-2x) to learn how to build low-latency big data solutions.

### Course Materials
* [Slides](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Implementing-Realtime-Analysis-with-Hadoop-in-HDInsight/tree/master/PPT)
* [Handouts](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Implementing-Realtime-Analysis-with-Hadoop-in-HDInsight/tree/master/Slides)
* [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Implementing-Realtime-Analysis-with-Hadoop-in-HDInsight/raw/master/Labs/DAT202.2x_Setup.pdf)
* [Lab Files](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Implementing-Realtime-Analysis-with-Hadoop-in-HDInsight/raw/master/Labs/HDRTLabs.zip)
* [Lab 1 - Getting Started with HBase](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Implementing-Realtime-Analysis-with-Hadoop-in-HDInsight/raw/master/Labs/DAT202.2x_Lab01.pdf)
* [Lab 2 - Getting Started with Storm (Java)](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Implementing-Realtime-Analysis-with-Hadoop-in-HDInsight/raw/master/Labs/DAT202.2x_Lab02(Java).pdf)
* [Lab 2 - Getting Started with Storm (C#)](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Implementing-Realtime-Analysis-with-Hadoop-in-HDInsight/raw/master/Labs/DAT202.2x_Lab02(C%23).pdf)
* [Lab 4 - Getting Started with Spark](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/Implementing-Realtime-Analysis-with-Hadoop-in-HDInsight/raw/master/Labs/DAT202.2x_Lab03.pdf)
